about_the_game:
A short visual story game. Alongside native adayo and descendants of genetically engineered crows, human nations are rebuilding on planet Tresmir, centuries after a cataclysmic war. Young human Alfón has entered the camp of adayo prophet Tisik, searching for something that matters to him.

Gameplay is pure dialogue, with branching choices. Playing as Alfón, you choose your outcome by the things you say. With a handful of characters, emphasis is on branching conversation. Designed for replay, what you learn about Alfón, Tisik, and others will affect the choices you make each time through.

Also includes an easy-to-use coloring book feature, because coloring books rock. Choose your own colors!
